About us

The rules of the free slot machines are simple. Despite the fact that all slot machines are different, their basic mechanics remain the same: select the desired bet size, number of bet lines, press the spin button. Regardless of the reels and line numbers, you can choose combinations for your bets.

For example, in the classic demo you can bet on all lines; this increases the bet size but increases your chances of winning. Once you've chosen your bet size and the number of paylines, spin the reels by pressing the spin button. After a few seconds the reels stop turning and the symbol combination appears. If the combination matches the selected paylines, you win. This process is repeated until the desired amount of money is won.
